biography: A former hairdresser, beautiful Anita Rinaldi entered the adult-film industry as a performer at the age of 19 in her native Budapest, Hungary. She appeared in films from 1993-99--one of the very first Hungarian porn stars--and was also a director, starting in 1997 and ending in 2008. She runs a modeling agency in Hungary for young women who want to get into the adult-film business.
name: Anita Rinaldi
